dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description: IBM MPI implementation from Spectrum MPI.
dependencies.name: mpi

dependencies.description:
The Parallel IO libraries (PIO) are high-level parallel I/O C and
Fortran libraries for applications that need to do netCDF I/O from large
numbers of processors on a HPC system.
dependencies.name: parallelio

description:
The Model for Prediction Across Scales (MPAS) is a collaborative project
for developing atmosphere, ocean and other earth-system simulation
components for use in climate, regional climate and weather studies.
name: mpas-model

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Predefined targets in the MPAS Makefile.
variants.name: make_target

variants.description: MPAS will be built with double/single precision reals.
variants.name: precision
